articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Unsan Tool Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Unsan Tool Factory
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the Unsan Tool Factory, kindling a torch for bringing about a radical turn in the tool production.
					 He, conducted by leading officials of the factory, went round the room devoted to its history.
					
					 He said the factory has turned into a reliable tool producer making a positive contribution to the nation's machine-building industry over the past dozens of years thanks to the wise guidance and meticulous care of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Then he made the rounds of the drill shop and other places of the factory to acquaint himself in detail with the technical equipment and production there. He warmly encouraged the workers waging a drive for increased production, counting every minute and second.
					
					 He expressed satisfaction with the fact that the workers of the factory are dynamically advancing toward the eminence of a thriving nation full of conviction and optimism, while displaying the heroic stamina of the Korean working class still today with the same vim and vigor with which they manufactured tools from scratch despite ordeals in the difficult postwar period. He highly appreciated their fighting spirit.
					
					 It is one of the prerequisites for the development of the machine industry to satisfactorily settle the problem of tools, a basis of the machine-building industry, he said.
					
					 Noting that the industry of the DPRK is now putting the production on a high-speed and precision basis by comprehensively  introducing  the production system equipped with Juche-based CNC machine tools, in particular, and making leaping progress, pushing back the frontiers of science and, accordingly,  requiring more tools of a high level commensurate with it, he said, earnestly calling upon the workers of the factory to intensify the drive for bringing about a radical turn in the tool production.
					
					 He said that when the supply of modern tools based on the latest science and technology is fully ensured, the nation's Juche-based industry with the machine-building industry as the core will be put on a higher stage.
					
					 In order to bring about a radical turn in the tool production it is necessary for the tool factory to conduct its technological updating in a bold and big way and fundamentally change its appearance, he noted, advancing the militant tasks to be fulfilled by the factory to turn itself into a model factory in the era of Songun equipped with the latest technology within one year.
					
					 It is a very huge task to complete the vast project for the technological updating of the factory in a matter of one year but it is quite possible to wind up the project ahead of schedule thanks to the inexhaustible mental power of the heroic Korean workers intensely loyal to the Party and the revolution and the strong support of the powerful Juche-based industry, he noted.
					
					 He expressed expectation and conviction that the workers of the factory would register shining achievements in the drive to bring about a radical turn in the tool production and thus contribute to putting the national economy on a Juche-oriented, modern and scientific basis. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Phyong Hae, chief secretary of the North Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK, Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, and Pak Nam Gi and Jang Song Thaek, department directors of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Chinese Defense Minister Enjoys Art Performance
articles.content:
Chinese Defense Minister Enjoys Art Performance
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- Col. General Liang Guanglie, minister of National Defense who doubles as a state councilor of the People's Republic of China, on a visit to the DPRK, enjoyed a performance given by the State Merited Chorus at the Pulgunbyol Theatre on Monday.
					 Present to enjoy the performance on invitation were Liang Guanglie and his party, the ambassador, the military, naval and air attache and staff members of the Chinese embassy here, Chinese guests and students staying in the DPRK.
					
					 Appreciating it with the guests were Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and minister of the People's Armed Forces, Pak Jae Gyong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, and servicepersons of the KPA.
					
					In such numbers as "The Leader Will Always Be with Us", "The Sound of a Horse's Hooves in Mt. Paektu" and "Song of the Korean People's Army" the chorus well represented the Korean army and people's profound reverence for President Kim Il Sung and their strong will to remain faithful to the Songun leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, the illustrious commander.
					
					 Put on the stage of the performance were also such Chinese songs as "There Is No New China without the Communist Party" and "Let's Sing of My Motherland".

articles.title: Shipwrecked Crewmen Back Home
articles.content:
Shipwrecked Crewmen Back Home
  Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- Crewmen of trading cargo ship "Jisong 5" of the DPRK came back home Monday after being shipwrecked.
					 The ship was hit by strong storm in the waters off China on Nov. 17 when it was sailing for China after leaving the DPRK.
					
					 The Chinese government and officials concerned conducted an urgent rescue operation for the crewmen adrift in a vast expansion of the sea and sincerely offered conveniences to the rescued crewmen in their living, thus showing well the Chinese people's spirit of helping the Korean people and contributing to bringing into bloom the traditional DPRK-China friendship this year, the "year of DPRK-China friendship". 
					
					 The crewmen, while braving the violent waves, thought about taking good care of the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, first of all, deeply touching people. 
					
					 They arrived at Pyongyang Airport by special plane.

articles.title: Singaporean Foreign Ministry Delegation Here
articles.content:
Singaporean Foreign Ministry Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Foreign Ministry of Singapore led by Bilahari Kausikan, second permanent secretary of the ministry, arrived here by air on Monday.

articles.title: Development of Calendar
articles.content:
Development of Calendar
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- The Korean nation had developed the calendar with importance attached to it and used it in farming and everyday life from ancient times.
					 The research into the calendar had been conducted from the period of the three kingdoms and the "Kujip Calendar" was made during the Kingdom of Koguryo.
					
					 The envoy of the Kingdom of Palhae brought the "Sonmyong Calendar", astronomical calendar, to Japan in 859. The latter had used it for 823 years from June of 861.
					
					 The "Sonmyong Calendar" was greatly conducive to developing astronomy, calendars and the overall social life in Japan. Later historians called the period of its use "Sonmyong Calendar era" and appreciated the presentation of the calendar as "a great memorial event in historical records" and "the greatest contribution to the Japanese culture" by the Palhae envoy.
					
					 The Koryo people developed the "Sonmyong Calendar" into new calendars including "Sipjong Calendar", "Chilyo Calendar", "Tungap Calendar" and "Kyonhaeng Calendar".
					
					Astronomer Kang Po who was active in the period from the end of the 13th century to the first half of the 14th century made a numeration table by applying higher order interpolation to the calendar calculation so as to carry out the calendar calculation in a swift and accurate way. With it he edited the book "Susiryokchopbopripsong", thus producing the framework for making the calendar in the country. The Susi Calendar based on it had been used for nearly one century.
					
					 The research into the calendar was deepened during Ri Dynasty. In particular it turned into a state affair under the rule of King Sejong and the calendar was supplemented by solar eclipse and lunar eclipse and five planet parts.
					
					 After that "Chonse Calendar" and other calendars were made and used in Korea.

articles.title: U.S. Urged to Establish Peacekeeping Mechanism
articles.content:
U.S. Urged to Establish Peacekeeping Mechanism
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- In order to put an end to confrontation and conflict in the Korean Peninsula and ensure its lasting peace and stability it is indispensable to terminate the state of ceasefire between the DPRK and the U.S. and establish a peacekeeping mechanism.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed commentary.
					
					 Recalling that recently a group of warships of the south Korean forces perpetrated such unpardonable criminal act as opening fire on a patrol boat of the Navy of the Korean People's Army on routine guard duty in the waters of the north side in the West Sea of Korea, the commentary says:
					
					 If the proposal for replacing the armistice agreement with a peace accord, previously advanced by the DPRK, had been carried into practice, the Korean Peninsula would have turned into a peaceful zone free from war danger and there would have been no such case of armed conflict.
					
					 It is impossible to prevent the recurrence of war and any accidental armed conflict with the outdated DPRK-U.S. armistice agreement, which has already been reduced to no more than wastepaper due to the U.S. perfidy.
					
					 To replace the armistice agreement with a peace agreement as early as possible is one of the most reasonable and practical ways for establishing a new peacekeeping mechanism in the Korean Peninsula and turning the present unstable state of ceasefire into the state of lasting peace.
					
					 Whether peacekeeping mechanism is established or not entirely depends on the U.S. stand and attitude.
					
					 The issues of removing war danger from the Korean Peninsula and preventing armed conflict between the north and the south can be solved fundamentally only when the U.S. drops its hostile policy towards the DPRK and replaces the armistice agreement with a peace agreement.
					
					 The establishment of peacekeeping mechanism only will be able to turn the relationship between the DPRK and the U.S., which are technically at the state of war, into peaceful one.
					
					 The U.S. should immediately make a courageous decision to opt for the establishment of new peacekeeping mechanism which will be helpful to removing the war danger from the Korean Peninsula and guaranteeing peace.
					
					 The U.S. is well advised to fulfill what it should do, far from playing a double game, and thus contribute to ensuring peace in the peninsula.

articles.title: Outbursts Let Loose by Hyon In Thaek under Fire
articles.content:
Outbursts Let Loose by Hyon In Thaek under Fire
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- Hyon In Thaek, minister of "Unification" of south Korea, was reported to have unhesitatingly defiled the dignified DPRK, asserting that "the north's dismantlement of its nukes is a precondition for improving the south-north relations."
					 On November 4 he let loose the jargon that the nuclear deterrent of the DPRK for self-defence is "disturbing the peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and obstructing the development of the south-north relations."
					
					 Some days ago, he let loose the vituperation that "it is unreasonable for the north to contend it may have normal relations with the international community and develop economy as a nuclear weapons state."
					
					 Moreover, he went the lengths of letting riff-raffs of the "Ministry of Unification" vie with each other telling cock-and-bull stories that "it is very difficult to cooperate and coexist with the nuclear armed north" and "the north should dismantle its nukes as early as possible."
					
					 As already known, Hyon In Thaek is a dyed-in-the-wool traitor to the nation as he took the lead in the moves against reunification and played a main role in shaping the anti-DPRK confrontational policy "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars", which drove the inter-Korean relations into catastrophe. 
					
					  He has desperately stood in the way of implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, shamelessly asserting that they are "the documents which have not been ratified by the National Assembly." He malignantly slandered the north, claiming that "it is an entity with which one cannot coexist on earth." He allowed himself to let loose the malediction that "it is good to have unification but not bad to go without having it."
					
					 Hyon was recently reported to have extolled to the sky the so-called "package solution" the keynote of which is south Korea's offer of something to the north in return for its abandonment of the core of the nuclear program, a piffle, thus bringing to bolder relief his true colors as an anti-reunification lackey.
					
					 He has been engrossed in the wrongdoings getting on the nerves of compatriots and deteriorating the inter-Korean relations. This is designed to put such anachronistic scenario for confrontation as "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars" into practice at any cost in a bid to stifle fellow countrymen and gratify his insatiable greed for power. 
					
					 History, however, will never pardon such traitors as Hyon In Thaek.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Escalating Confrontation
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Escalating Confrontation
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean puppets became one of the co-sponsors of the so-called "resolution on human rights situation in north Korea" at the UN General Assembly, zealously joining the United States in its conspiratorial  "human rights" row against the DPRK. Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a signed commentary carried in this regard:
					This was an intolerable insult and another unpardonable politically motivated provocation to the DPRK.
					
					 The popular masses in the DPRK are fully enjoying an independent life, truly guaranteed all sorts of political freedom and rights as full-fledged masters of power and society. There can be no "human rights" issue under the dignified socialist system in the DPRK.
					
					 The fascist maniacs are kicking up such "human rights" racket against the DPRK after reducing south Korea to an area with the world's worst human rights record through the dictatorship enforced under the signboard of "pragmatism." This imprudent and shameless rash act can be perpetrated only by those who do not know where they stand. 
					
					 The anti-reunification conservative forces in south Korea are now desperately working to achieve their sinister aims, blatantly challenging the magnanimous and sincere efforts of the DPRK to improve the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 Hyon In Thaek and other mandarins of the "Ministry of Unification" of south Korea and war maniacs of its military are desperately pursuing the moves for confrontation and war, throwing a wet blanket on the growing desire of the compatriots for reunification and the atmosphere of inter-Korean reconciliation.
					
					 The co-sponsorship of the above-said resolution was prompted by a criminal aim to escalate the confrontation between fellow countrymen over the human rights issue and push the inter-Korean relations to an uncontrollable catastrophe.
					
					 The puppets went the lengths of bringing their anti-DPRK racket even to the international arena over its non-existent "human rights" issue. This clearly proves that they are steeped in the confrontation in the political system and the stand-off with fellow countrymen and bitterness towards them to the marrow of their bones.
					
					 No improved inter-Korean relations can be expected as long as the anti-reunification forces in south Korea are getting frantic with the anti-DPRK racket for confrontation, swimming against the trend of the times.

articles.title: S. Korean Military's Reckless Action Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Military's Reckless Action Assailed
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- The bellicose forces of the south Korean military let several warships chase a patrol boat of the Navy of the Korean People's Army on routine guard duty and fire thousands of bullets and shells at it in the West Sea of Korea on November 10. Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a signed article in this regard:
					 The armed provocation perpetrated by the south Korean military was not an accidental case but a deliberate and premeditated action to ignite a war of aggression on the Korean Peninsula at any cost to invade the DPRK, opposed to national reconciliation, unity and reunification. 
					
					 Recently south Korea has systematically pursued dangerous war moves to militarily threaten fellow countrymen and strain the situation on the Korean Peninsula even since the DPRK took an initiative for improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The south Korean military forces held with the U.S. the 41st south Korea-U.S. "annual security consultative meeting" in Seoul in October last at which they discussed adventurous "military countermeasures" over the non-existent "nuclear threat from the north" again.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is the fact that some time ago, the south Korean military together with the U.S. completed "OPLAN 5029" allegedly aimed at coping with "contingency in the north".
					
					 Frequent clouds bring rain. The recent armed provocation in the West Sea was an inevitable product of the premeditated moves of the U.S. and the south Korean warlike forces for a war of aggression against the DPRK as they have systematically escalated the military confrontation with it.
					
					 The DPRK can never overlook the reckless moves of the south Korean military bellicose forces to escalate the military confrontation as it has an important mission and responsibility to fulfill for defending the security of the country and the nation and achieving durable peace on the peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK's retaliation against the provokers is limitless and merciless. It will take decisive actions which no latest means can counter. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities can never evade the responsibility for having driven the inter-Korean relations into the brink of war, going against the trend of the June 15 era of reunification,  and they will come to clearly realize how serious their consequences will be.

articles.title: Just Cause of Korean People Supported
articles.content:
Just Cause of Korean People Supported
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- Prakash Karat, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of India (Marxist) Friday met and had a talk with the delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea participating in the 11th international meeting of communist and workers' parties.
					 He said that his party has a long-standing friendly and comradely relationship with the WPK and this relationship has been consolidated and developed through scores of years for the common ideal and purposes for independence and socialism against imperialism.
					
					 In the past President Kim Il Sung received the delegations of the Communist Party of India (Marxist) visiting the DPRK and made a great contribution to the development of the relationship between the two parties, he noted, stressing: Our party fully supports the just cause of the WPK and the Korean people steadfastly defending the socialist cause while decisively smashing the U.S. imperialists' moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK.
					
					He said that his party wishes the WPK greater success in the efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation and achieve national reunification under the wise leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, true to the behests of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Annual Meeting of KFA Held
articles.content:
Annual Meeting of KFA Held
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain was held in Italy on Nov. 14.
					 Exhibited at the meeting hall were works of the peerlessly great persons, books on their revolutionary activities and feats and publications introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Attending the meeting were Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the association, and representatives and members of its branches in various countries including Italy, Britain and Switzerland. And present on invitation were staff members of the DPRK embassy in Italy.
					
					 A report and speeches were made there.
					
					The chairman of the association noted that the Korean people have striven to implement the behests of President Kim Il Sung, overcoming all difficulties under the leadership of General Secretary
						 Kim Jong Il, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 He felt strongly on several occasions that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are really prominent persons, he said, stressing that only victory is always in store for those advancing under the guidance of the peerlessly great men.
					
					 Discussed at the meeting were measures for commemorating the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung most significantly on a worldwide scale.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted there.

articles.title: Noodle and Mustard Seed
articles.content:
Noodle and Mustard Seed
Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung gave field guidance to the area of Kaema Plateau in August, Juche 52 (1963).
					At a consultation meeting, he set forth the task to encourage the mustard cultivation and produce a large amount of its seed, saying that mustard powder is good spice not only to noodle but also to other foodstuffs and the mustard seed is good raw material of the mustard powder.
					
					He added that the mass-production of mustard seed could raise cash income.
					
					Mustard powder, which improves appetite with hot taste and peculiar odor and, at the same time, is a good drug-stuff for its various medical elements, is also associated with the warm paternal love of the President who always directed deep attention to the improvement of the people's dietary life.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il inspecciona la sede del MINSEP
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il inspecciona la sede del MINSEP
Pyongyang, 23 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono la sede del Ministerio de Seguridad del Pueblo.
					En el mismo lugar acogieron al Dirigente Ju Sang Song, miembro del CDN de la RPDC y ministro de Seguridad del Pueblo, Ri Pyong Sam, jefe de la Direccion Politica de esta dependencia y otros miembros directivos del MINSEP.
					
					Luego de recibir el saludo mediante la guardia de honor,  recorrio la sala de investigacion tecnica y otros lugares haciendo conocimiento detallado del estado de cumplimiento de servicio.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho de que todos los miembros directivos y otros integrantes de seguridad publica de esta dependencia, conscientes profundamente de la mision honrosa de la unidad de la primera linea de la lucha clasista y del ejercito interior del Partido, cumplen con responsabilidad el deber combativo asumido, y evaluo sus esfuerzos.
					
					 Senalo que el ejercito interior, que tiene la brillante tradicion de defensa a ultranza al lider de mas de 60 anos, defiende con firmeza la primera linea de la lucha clasista y protege confiablemente las conquistas de la patria socialista y la seguridad del pueblo haciendo asi un gran aporte al desarrollo del pais, y evaluo altamente sus orgullosas proezas logradas en el pasado.
					
					Subrayo que es invencible nuestra patria socialista porque el heroico EPC crecido como invencible fila capaz de aniquilar uno contra cien enemigos salvaguarda inexpugnablemente la linea de defensa de la patria y el ejercito interior, infinitamente fiel al Partido, el Lider, la patria y el pueblo, protege fidedignamente la seguridad del pais y el pueblo.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los integrantes de seguridad publica, que son los defensores de la politica del partido y combatientes vanguardistas de la lucha clasista, defenderan a costa de la vida las conquistas de la revolucion, la vida y los bienes del pueblo y presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia para fortalecer la combatividad del ejercito interior.
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario del CC del PTC Kim Ki Nam, el miembro del CDN de la RPDC y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC Jang Song Thaek y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia funcion artistica de Unidad No. 147
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia funcion artistica de Unidad No. 147
Pyongyang, 23 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio la funcion artistica de los militares de una compania adscrita a la Unidad No. 147 del EPC.
					Los uniformados pusieron en la escena el quinteto "Canto de urraca en el puesto", la narracion y cancion "Felicidad de vivir en el regazo del respetado General", el solo "Al lado del General viven los soldados", la recitacion de poesia "Mi patria", el conjunto de musica instrumental "!Que buena es mi Patria!", el coro "Yepuni" y otras piezas de diversos generos.
					
					En la ocasion los ejecutantes cantaron en tono patetico la digna vida de servicio militar, que llevan en el regazo paternal del General paternal siendo muy felices, y mostraron vigorosamente el poderio del heroico EPC crecido como poderoso ejercito sin rival, la ferrea conviccion, voluntad y el temperamento combativo de todos los uniformados del mismo dispuestos a defender a la Direccion de la Revolucion sirviendo de baluarte y escudo y a llevar a feliz termino con el fusil la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					Muy satisfecho de que los militares de la compania hayan ofrecido esta magnifica funcion con diversas piezas que reflejan de manera veridica su vida, el Comandante Supremo aprecio mucho sus exitos alcanzados en la ocasion y les dio agradecimiento.
					
					Subrayo que todos nuestros militares del EPC se han preparado como los fuertes en la ideologia y la fe, los revolucionarios intransigentes y combatientes del Songun con grandes dotes culturales.
					
					Anadio que gracias a tales fidedignos soldados que defienden la linea avanzada de la patria con la capacidad de pelear a solas contra cien enemigos, nuestra patria socialista ha sido una fortaleza inexpugnable.
					
					Presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia para la intensificacion de las actividades artisticas en la compania y otras demas unidades.
					
					Le acompanaron en disfrutar el espectaculo el vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el general de ejercito del EPC Kim Jong Gak, miembro del CDN de la RPDC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el general de ejercito del EPC Ri Yong Ho, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, y otros miembros directivos del EPC, los secretarios Choe Thae Bok y Kim Ki Nam, los jefes, los primeros subjefes y otros cuadros directivos, del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il ve funcion de grupos de agitacion artistica movil
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il ve funcion de grupos de agitacion artistica movil
Pyongyang, 23 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, presencio la funcion de los miembros de los grupos de agitacion artistica movil de los Complejos de Locomotoras Electricas Kim Jong Thae, de Maquinaria Pesada de Taean y de Tabaco asi como del circulo artistico de la Fabrica de Alimentos para Ninos de Pyongyang.
					En la escena se presentaron el coro "No envidiamos nada a nadie en el mundo", el poema y narracion "Continuaremos hasta el fin el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu", el coro mixto "Que conquiste la tecnica de punta", el canto homofono con tambor "Corea avanza enarbolando la bandera roja", la narracion y agitacion "Ano que ocurre evento", el tambor y coro "Sigamos a nuestro General" y otras piezas.
					
					A traves de la funcion, los ejecutantes mostraron energicamente el temperamento combativo de la heroica clase obrera de Corea que llena de la invencible conviccion y optimismo avanza a todo galope hacia la cima de la gran potencia prospera y el aspecto orgulloso de nueva cultura obrera creada en la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar).
					
					El Dirigente expreso gran satisfaccion de que los obreros de fabrica y empresas ofrecieron la excelente funcion perfecta en lo ideologico y artistico con las obras de gran significacion cognoscitivo-educativa que reflejan sinceramente su vida.
					
					Evaluo altamente que los miembros de grupo de agitacion artistica movil y del circulo artistico estimulan activamente a los militantes del partido y otros trabajadores a crear nuevos milagros y hazanas mediante las amplias actividades artisticas entre las masas en la realidad bulliciosa y dio  agradecimiento a todos los ejecutantes.
					
					Apunto que nuestra clase obrera heroica ha mostrado sin reserva a traves de la trayectoria de la lucha larga y ardua su aspecto majestuoso como destacamento de fidelidad que apoya fielmente la idea y la direccion del partido y el Lider y como unidad nuclear de la revolucion que mantiene los principios socialistas con la inconmovible posicion independiente y antiimperialista.
					
					Anadio que la victoria de la gran potencia prospera es definitiva porque esa clase obrera confiable defiende firmemente la linea avanzada de la construccion de la patria rica.
					
					El Dirigente presento las tareas programaticas que se plantean en fortalecer las actividades culturales y artisticas entre las masas.
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario del CC del PTC Kim Ki Nam, los jefes y primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, asi como los funcionarios directivos de fabrica y empresas correspondientes.

articles.title: En Pyongyang el ministro de Defensa Nacional de China
articles.content:
En Pyongyang el ministro de Defensa Nacional de China
Pyongyang, 23 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Llego el dia 22 por via aerea a Pyongyang el coronel general Liang Guanglie, consejero de Estado y ministro de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular China.
					Arribaron junto con el el coronel general Huang Xianzhong, comisario politico de la Zona Militar de Shenyang del Ejercito Popular de Liberacion de China (EPLCh), el teniente general Feng Zhaoju, subcomandante de la Zona Militar de Jinan, el vicealmirante Xu Hongmeng, subcomandante de la Zona Militar de Nanjing y comandante de la Flota del Mar Oriental de la Fuerza Naval, el teniente general de la Fuerza Aerea Jiang Jianzeng, subcomandante de la Zona Militar de Nanjing y comandante de la Fuerza Aerea de la Zona Militar, el mayor general Chai Shaoliang, jefe de organizacion del Departamento Politico General del EPLCh, el mayor general Wang Jin, subdirector del Departamento de Operacion del Estado Mayor General, el mayor general Jia Xiaoning, subdirector de la Oficina de los Asuntos Exteriores del Ministerio de Defensa Nacional y otros acompanantes.
					
					Liang Guanglie publico su discurso de llegada.
					
					Una ceremonia de bienvenida al visitante tuvo lugar en la explanada frente al Monumento a la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Liang Guanglie y su comitiva, el embajador chino Liu Xiaoming, el agregado militar Sun Yanfeng y otros miembros de la embajada china en Corea, los huespedes y estudiantes chinos que permanecen en Corea.
					
					Y participaron el vicemariscal del Ejercito Popular de Corea Kim Yong Chun, vicepresidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el viceministro de FAP Pak Jae Gyong, los generales y oficiales del EPC.
					
					Liang Guanglie, junto con Kim Yong Chun, paso revista a la Guardia de Honor del EPC.

articles.title: Kim Yong Chun se reune con su homologo chino
articles.content:
Kim Yong Chun se reune con su homologo chino
Pyongyang, 23 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El vicemariscal del Ejercito Popular de Corea Kim Yong Chun, vicepresidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, se reunio el dia 22 con el coronel general Liang Guanglie, consejero de Estado y ministro de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular China, quien le hizo una vista de cortesia.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el viceministro de FAP Pak Jae Gyong, el coronel general del EPC Sim Sang Dae, el teniente general del EPC Kim Su Hak y otros generales y oficiales del EPC.
					
					Por la parte china, se encontraban el coronel general Huang Xianzhong, comisario politico de la Zona Militar de Shenyang del Ejercito Popular de Liberacion de China (EPLCh), el teniente general Feng Zhaoju, subcomandante de la Zona Militar de Jinan, el vicealmirante Xu Hongmeng, subcomandante de la Zona Militar de Nanjing y comandante de la Flota del Mar Oriental de la Fuerza Naval, el teniente general de la Fuerza Aerea Jiang Jianzeng, subcomandante de la Zona Militar de Nanjing y comandante de la Fuerza Aerea de la misma zona, el mayor general Chai Shaoliang, jefe de organizacion del Departamento Politico General del EPLCh, el mayor general Wang Jin, subdirector del Departamento de Operacion del Estado Mayor General, el mayor general Jia Xiaoning, subdirector de la Oficina de los Asuntos Exteriores del Ministerio de Defensa Nacional, y otros acompanantes, el embajador Liu Xiaoming y el agregado militar Sun Yanfeng de la embajada china en Corea.
					
					Tras dar calida bienvenida al visitante, Kim Yong Chun departio con el en un clima camaraderil y amistoso.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe presente de Liang Guanglie y su comitiva
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe presente de Liang Guanglie y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 23 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio presente que le dirigieran el coronel general Liang Guanglie, consejero de Estado y ministro de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular China, y su comitiva, de visita en Corea.
					El visitante lo entrego el dia 22 al vicemariscal del Ejercito Popular de Corea Kim Yong Chun, vicepresidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares.

articles.title: MINFAP ofrece banquete en honor de Liang Guanglie
articles.content:
MINFAP ofrece banquete en honor de Liang Guanglie
Pyongyang, 23 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares ofrecio el dia 22 un banquete en honor del ministro de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular China, de visita en Corea.
					A la recepcion fueron invitados el coronel general Liang Guanglie, consejero de Estado y ministro de Defensa Nacional de RPCh y su comitiva, el embajador Liu Xiaoming y el agregado militar Sun Yanfeng de la embajada china acreditada en Corea.
					
					Y participaron tambien el vicemariscal del Ejercito Popular de Corea Kim Yong Chun, vicepresidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el viceministro de las FAP Pak Jae Gyong, los generales y oficiales del EPC.
					
					Kim Yong Chun, en su discurso, senalo que la presente visita de su homologo chino servira de apoyo y estimulo a nuestro ejercito y pueblo que en pleno acato a la direccion del Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun (priorizacion militar) construyen la gran potencia prospera y de importante motivo que impulsa el desarrollo de los tradicionales vinculos amistosos de los ejercitos de los dos paises.
					
					Subrayo que la amistad Corea-China preparada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung junto con los dirigentes de la generacion vieja de China se fortalece bajo la profunda atencion de los maximos Dirigentes de los dos paises.
					
					Enfatizo que consolidar invariablemente la amistad Corea-China que ha superado las tempestades de toda indole de la historia es inconmovible posicion del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea.
					
					Dijo que bajo la direccion del Partido Comunista de China encabezado por el Secretario General Hu Jintao, el ejercito y el pueblo de China logran grandes exitos en la construccion de la sociedad socialista armoniosa basada en la concepcion de desarrollo cientifico.
					
					Deseo de todo corazon al ejercito y el pueblo de China mayores exitos en la labor para construir el socialismo con peculiaridad de China.
					
					Liang Guanglie en su discurso dijo que visito Corea, vecino amistoso, con el profundo sentimiento del pueblo y el ejercito de China al pueblo y el ejercito de Corea y expreso agradecimiento por haberles dado la hospitalidad especial 
					
					Recordo que hace ahora mas de 50 anos, experimento con carne propia las relaciones de amistad China-Corea enlazadas con la sangre  permaneciendo en Corea como soldado del Ejercito de Voluntarios del Pueblo Chino.
					
					Recalco que la fuerza unida entre los ejercitos y los pueblos de ambos paises no puede ser quebrantada con nada sino sera eterna.
					
					Anadio que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion China-Corea, que se han desarrollado sin cesar en virtud de los esfuerzos de ambas partes, hicieron aporte a impulsar de modo activo la construccion socialista de ambos paises y preservar la paz y la estabilidad de la region.
					
					Destaco que ellos mismos se regocijan de que bajo la direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el pueblo y el ejercito de Corea logran grandes exitos en la construccion de la gran potencia prospera poniendo de manifiesto el espiritu de autoconfianza y de tenaz lucha.
					
					Se refirio a que consolidar las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion China-Corea es el anhelo de los pueblos de los dos paises y finalizo que se esforzaran activamente con los camaradas coreanos para el particular.

articles.title: Visitara Corea el presidente de Consejo de Federacion Rusa
articles.content:
Visitara Corea el presidente de Consejo de Federacion Rusa
Pyongyang, 23 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Serguei Mijailovich Mironov, presidente del Consejo de la Federacion Rusa, realizara pronto una visita a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea cumplimentando la invitacion de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC.
